meanings.definition: Situated in front of the tail.
meanings.sent1: The precaudal fin helps the fish steer.
meanings.sent2: The precaudal feathers of the bird are colorful.
meanings.sent3: The precaudal position of the mailbox made it hard to reach.
meanings.sent4: Her precaudal knowledge of the subject impressed the teacher.
meanings.sent5: The precaudal warning signs alerted hikers to potential dangers ahead.
